name: Euro Coinvertible
description: EUR-C is an Euro pegged stablecoin launched by Societe General's Crypto Division, SG Forge with the aim to provide institutional clients with access to liquidity and efficient means of transferring funds across the Ethereum blockchain. This initiative is part of Societe Generale's broader strategy to leverage blockchain technology and tap into the growing institutional demand for digital assets. More information can be found at https://www.sgforge.com/societe-generale-forge-launches-coinvertible-the-first-institutional-stablecoin-deployed-on-a-public-blockchain/?ref=coingecko Be noted that a publicly accessible market for EUR-C may not likely be available for the general masses in the forseeable future.
